content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --DECOD
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --DECOD
      operator: is_contained_by
      value:
        - MedDRA preferred TERM
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0379
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when --DECOD  is not a valid MedDRA preferred TERM
Outcome:
  Message: --DECOD  is not a valid MedDRA preferred TERM
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0379
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Equivalent to the Preferred Term (PT in MedDRA).
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --DECOD
                Section: Events
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - AE

json.Description: Trigger error when --DECOD  is not a valid MedDRA preferred TERM

Outcome.Message: --DECOD  is not a valid MedDRA preferred TERM

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Equivalent to the Preferred Term (PT in MedDRA).
